description:
The Green (Institute of Preventative Medicine)

(T5) London Plane - Climb and inspect for massaria symptoms and remove minor dead wood. Remove branch during aerial inspection if infected.

(T6) London Plane - Check branch via aerial inspection for massaria symptoms and remove if infected. Remove broken suspended branch in northwest mid crown directly over footpath.

(T7) London Plane - Check branch via aerial inspection for massaria symptoms and remove if infected. Remove major deadwood.

(T9) London Plane - Check this branch via aerial inspection for massaria symptoms and inspect remaining crown which may inform further works.

(T25) Wild Cherry - Fell to near ground level and plant suitable replacement tree.

(T26) Wild Cherry - Fell to near ground level and plant suitable replacement tree.

(T27) Wild Cherry - Dismantle tree to near ground level and plant suitable replacement tree.
site_name: Barts And The Queen Mary'S Medcial College
